hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: New Cassel: Off-Duty Police Officer Shot

body.head.byline: By ANTHONY RAMIREZ; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Off-duty New York City police officer is shot during possible attempted robbery in New Cassel, NY (S)

block.p: An off-duty New York City police officer was shot in the hand during a possible attempted robbery early yesterday, the Nassau County police said. The 25-year-old officer, whom the Nassau police did not identify, was treated at Nassau University Medical Center and then released. At 4 a.m., the off-duty officer was sitting in his car, which was parked on Kinkel Street between Prospect Avenue and Broadway, when a man with a handgun approached. A fight ensued, and the officer drove off after he was wounded in the left hand, the police said. The assailant was still at large last night.
